languages.text: "Но как же... За семьдесят лет службы — и ни одного распоряжения! Ни с Терры священной, ни с Даргонуса! Нарушения коммуникаций! Какой кошмар, какой же бардак в процессах..." {n}Бледное лицо секретаря покрывается бурыми пятнами.{/n} "Но это легко исправить! Если Администратуму нужен такой служитель, я немедленно начну подготовку к сервиторизации. Воля {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialis}Лекс Империалис{/g} превыше всего!"

traits.locale_text: "Но как же... За семьдесят лет службы — и ни одного распоряжения! Ни с Терры священной, ни с Даргонуса! Нарушения коммуникаций! Какой кошмар, какой же бардак в процессах..." {n}Бледное лицо секретаря покрывается бурыми пятнами.{/n} "Но это легко исправить! Если Администратуму нужен такой служитель, я немедленно начну подготовку к сервиторизации. Воля Лекс Империалис превыше всего!"

languages.text: "But... After seventy years of service — and not a single directive! Not from Holy Terra or from Dargonus! A complete breakdown in communication! What a farce, what an insult against all processes..." {n}Scarlet patches blossom on the secretary's pale face.{/n} "But this is easily remedied! If the Administratum requires such a servant, then I will immediately begin preparations for servitorisation. The will of the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialis}Lex Imperialis{/g} is supreme!"

What a farce, what an insult against all processes..." {n}Scarlet patches blossom on the secretary's pale face.{/n} "But this is easily remedied! If the Administratum requires such a servant, then I will immediately begin preparations for servitorisation. The will of the Lex Imperialis is supreme!"

"But... After seventy years of service — and not a single directive! Not from Holy Terra or from Dargonus! A complete breakdown in communication! What a farce, what an insult against all processes..." {n}Scarlet patches blossom on the secretary's pale face.{/n} "But this is easily remedied! If the Administratum requires such a servant, then I will immediately begin preparations for servitorisation. The will of the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialis}Lex Imperialis{/g} is supreme!"

languages.text: “可……我兢兢业业地服侍了七十年，却没有收到过任何指示！无论是神圣泰拉还是达戈努斯，都没有下达过任何指示！沟通完全被中断了！怎么会有这样的闹剧？这简直是对这一切的侮辱……”{n}秘书苍白的脸上绽出了红色的斑点。{/n}“但这个问题很容易补救。如果内政部真的需要这样的仆人，那我愿意立刻准备接受机仆改造。{g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialis}帝国{/g}的意志高于一切！”
languages.original_text: "But... After seventy years of service — and not a single directive! Not from Holy Terra or from Dargonus! A complete breakdown in communication! What a farce, what an insult against all processes..." {n}Scarlet patches blossom on the secretary's pale face.{/n} "But this is easily remedied! If the Administratum requires such a servant, then I will immediately begin preparations for servitorisation. The will of the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialis}Lex Imperialis{/g} is supreme!"

traits.locale_text: “可……我兢兢业业地服侍了七十年，却没有收到过任何指示！无论是神圣泰拉还是达戈努斯，都没有下达过任何指示！沟通完全被中断了！怎么会有这样的闹剧？这简直是对这一切的侮辱……”{n}秘书苍白的脸上绽出了红色的斑点。{/n}“但这个问题很容易补救。如果内政部真的需要这样的仆人，那我愿意立刻准备接受奴工改造。帝国的意志高于一切！”

languages.text: «Pero... ¡setenta años de servicio y ni una sola directiva! ¡Ni de la sagrada Terra ni de Dargonus! ¡Una pérdida total de comunicación! Menuda farsa, menudo insulto contra todos los procedimientos...». {n}La cara pálida del secretario se enciende de rabia.{/n} «¡Pero esto tiene una solución sencilla! Si el Administratum necesita un sirviente así, comenzaré de inmediato los preparativos para la servidorización. ¡La voluntad de la {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialis}Lex Imperialis{/g} es suprema!».
languages.original_text: "But... After seventy years of service — and not a single directive! Not from Holy Terra or from Dargonus! A complete breakdown in communication! What a farce, what an insult against all processes..." {n}Scarlet patches blossom on the secretary's pale face.{/n} "But this is easily remedied! If the Administratum requires such a servant, then I will immediately begin preparations for servitorisation. The will of the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialis}Lex Imperialis{/g} is supreme!"

traits.locale_text: «Pero... ¡setenta años de servicio y ni una sola directiva! ¡Ni de la sagrada Terra ni de Dargonus! ¡Una pérdida total de comunicación! Menuda farsa, menudo insulto contra todos los procedimientos...». {n}La cara pálida del secretario se enciende de rabia.{/n} «¡Pero esto tiene una solución sencilla! Si el Administratum necesita un sirviente así, comenzaré de inmediato los preparativos para la servidorización. ¡La voluntad de la Lex Imperialis es suprema!».

languages.text: 「しかし…。70年間の奉公は…それに、指示は何も出てない！聖なる地球からも、ダルゴナスからも！コミュニケーションの完全放棄もいいところだ！何という茶番、全ての手続きに対する侮辱…」{n}秘書の青白い顔に、緋色の斑点が花開くように現れる。{/n}「ですが、これに対処するのはたやすい！行政局がそのような従者を必要とするならば、すぐにサーヴィター化の準備を始めましょう。{g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialis}レックス・インペリア号{/g}の意思こそ至高！」
languages.original_text: "But... After seventy years of service — and not a single directive! Not from Holy Terra or from Dargonus! A complete breakdown in communication! What a farce, what an insult against all processes..." {n}Scarlet patches blossom on the secretary's pale face.{/n} "But this is easily remedied! If the Administratum requires such a servant, then I will immediately begin preparations for servitorisation. The will of the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialis}Lex Imperialis{/g} is supreme!"

traits.locale_text: 「しかし…。70年間の奉公は…それに、指示は何も出てない！聖なる地球からも、ダルゴナスからも！コミュニケーションの完全放棄もいいところだ！何という茶番、全ての手続きに対する侮辱…」{n}秘書の青白い顔に、緋色の斑点が花開くように現れる。{/n}「ですが、これに対処するのはたやすい！行政局がそのような従者を必要とするならば、すぐにサーヴィター化の準備を始めましょう。{g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialis}レックス・インペリア号{/g}の意思こそ至高！」

languages.text: "Aber ... nach siebzig Jahren im Dienst – keine einzige Direktive! Nicht von der Heiligen Terra oder von Dargonus! Ein kompletter Zusammenbruch der Kommunikation! Was für eine Farce, was für eine Verletzung sämtlicher Abläufe ..." {n}Rote Flecken erscheinen auf dem blassen Gesicht des Sekretärs.{/n} "Aber das lässt sich problemlos klären! Wenn so ein Diener vom Administratum gewünscht wird, werde ich umgehend die Servitorisierung einleiten. Der Wille des {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialis}Lex Imperia{/g} steht über allem!"
languages.original_text: "But... After seventy years of service — and not a single directive! Not from Holy Terra or from Dargonus! A complete breakdown in communication! What a farce, what an insult against all processes..." {n}Scarlet patches blossom on the secretary's pale face.{/n} "But this is easily remedied! If the Administratum requires such a servant, then I will immediately begin preparations for servitorisation. The will of the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialis}Lex Imperialis{/g} is supreme!"

traits.locale_text: "Aber ... nach siebzig Jahren im Dienst – keine einzige Direktive! Nicht von der heiligen Terra der von Dargonus! Ein kompletter Zusammenbruch der Kommunikation! Was für eine Farce, was für eine Verletzung sämtlicher Abläufe ..." {n}Rote Flecken erscheinen auf dem blassen Gesicht des Sekretärs.{/n} "Aber das lässt ich problemlos klären! Wenn so ein Diener vom Administratum gewünscht wird, werde ich umgehend die Servitorisierung einleiten. Der Wille des Lex Imperia steht über allem!"

languages.text: « Mais... je n'ai jamais reçu la moindre directive à ce sujet en soixante-dix ans de service, ni de la Sainte Terra ni de Dargonus ! Cette absence de communication est tout simplement scandaleuse ! Un véritable affront envers tous les protocoles... » {n}Des taches rouges apparaissent sur le visage pâle du secrétaire.{/n} « Mais je peux facilement remédier à ce problème ! Si l'Administratum estime qu'un servitor est plus apte à faire ce travail, je vais immédiatement prendre les dispositions nécessaires pour effectuer la transition. La volonté de la {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialis}Lex Imperialis{/g} est suprême ! »
languages.original_text: "But... After seventy years of service — and not a single directive! Not from Holy Terra or from Dargonus! A complete breakdown in communication! What a farce, what an insult against all processes..." {n}Scarlet patches blossom on the secretary's pale face.{/n} "But this is easily remedied! If the Administratum requires such a servant, then I will immediately begin preparations for servitorisation. The will of the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialis}Lex Imperialis{/g} is supreme!"

Un véritable affront envers tous les protocoles... » {n}Des taches rouges apparaissent sur le visage pâle du secrétaire.{/n} « Mais je peux facilement remédier à ce problème ! Si l'Administratum estime qu'un servitor est plus apte à faire ce travail, je vais immédiatement prendre les dispositions nécessaires pour effectuer la transition. La volonté de la Lex Imperialis est suprême ! »

languages.text: "Nasıl olur? Ben İmparatorluk'a yetmiş sene hizmet ettim! Ne Kutsal Terra'dan ne de Dargonus'tan tek bir dilekçe geldi! Muhaberat hiçe sayılmış! Bu ne maskaralık, bu ne tahkir..." {n}Yazmanın solgun yüzü al al oluyor.{/n} "Lakin ziyanı yok! Administratum böyle bir hizmetkâra ihtiyaç duyuyorsa derhâl hizmetörleştirme hazırlığına başlayacağım. {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialis}Lex İmperialis'in{/g} emri plasçeliği keser!"
languages.original_text: "But... After seventy years of service — and not a single directive! Not from Holy Terra or from Dargonus! A complete breakdown in communication! What a farce, what an insult against all processes..." {n}Scarlet patches blossom on the secretary's pale face.{/n} "But this is easily remedied! If the Administratum requires such a servant, then I will immediately begin preparations for servitorisation. The will of the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialis}Lex Imperialis{/g} is supreme!"

Bu ne maskaralık, bu ne tahkir..." {n}Yazmanın solgun yüzü al al oluyor.{/n} "Lakin ziyanı yok! Administratum böyle bir hizmetkâra ihtiyaç duyuyorsa derhâl servitörleştirilme hazırlığına başlayacağım. {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialis}Lex Imperialis{/g}'in emri plasçeliği keser!"
